items.title: Opendoor’s stock may be drawing in more bearish bets against it, even as it keeps rising. Here’s why.
items.description: Shares of heavily shorted Opendoor Technologies are continuing their rally, putting the stock on pace to extend its winning streak to seven days.

items.title: Weight loss has become the hottest new Chinese consumer craze
items.description: A wellness boom is reshaping China, from gyms and diet apps to new injectable drugs — and spending habits.
